response.original_title: The Truth Behind Hip Hop 2: "Exodus Into Egypt?"
response.overview: To speak the truth is not always an easy task. Especially when the truth is hard-hitting and deals with the issues of the day. Such is the ministry presentation of Minister G. Craige Lewis and EX Ministries. The Truth Behind Hip Hop: "Exodus Into Egypt?" exposes the inner workings of the stratagems of the enemy. The Word of the Lord declares that "My people are destroyed for the lack of knowledge". God has given this ministry not only the knowledge but also the platform. Thousands have been changed through this powerful word directly from the throne. Experience the ministry that is responsible for packing auditoriums all over the country. And with the information contained in the DVD presentation, young people have been empowered to effect change. Whom the Son sets free is free indeed. And no doubt, when it is ended, you will know what true freedom is about.
